name: Extremum Spiritum
description:
This is a work in progress demo.

Need you're feedback to improve the gameplay.

There will be bugs and when you unlock the final door the demo is finished.

Version 1.5.0

Fixed some bugs.

Added textures for some items.

Added new animations and effects for the UI.

Added new mechanic (Camera zoom, Now you can hold Z to Zoom the camera so you can see better the smaller items).

Added signs.
